general.name: Seat NPC [Custom, Steve]
general.description:
Just put a URL into the box that goes to a PNG file, and you're good!
Don't come crying to me if it doesn't work because you didn't give it a direct link!
NOTE FOR SERVER OWNERS: I do not take responsibility for what §oyour§r§7 players put here.
If you don't like §otheir§r§7 content, simply take away their custom bodypillows and make them uncraftable.
Transparency does not work properly either.
